projects.name: Yadree: Business Intelligence Consultant System
projects.description: A comprehensive AI-powered business intelligence solution that integrates real-time data visualization, SQLFlow, and machine learning to enhance decision-making.

projects.name: Pixify: AI-Powered Ecommerce and Financial Services Platform
projects.description: Pixilated offers an innovative AI-powered financial ecommerce platform designed for flexibility and personalization. With customizable plans tailored to user needs.

projects.name: Virtue 2.0
projects.description: An AI mental health support tool offering appointments with top practitioners. Features both payment and non-profit charity plans, enabling users to get diagnoses and connect with the best mental health professionals.

projects.name: KPI on the Fly AI
projects.description: An AI-powered business intelligence platform that generates KPIs in real-time from data. It integrates Apache Superset for easy dashboard creation.

projects.name: PRF Production
projects.description: A creative services provider offering video production, photography, and more, with AI-driven solutions for enhancing the creative process.

projects.name: SautNote AI
projects.description: An AI-driven transcription service that converts audio into accurate, text-based notes, enhancing productivity for professionals and students.

projects.name: Wajibaty AI
projects.description: A vibrant AI-powered platform designed to help users manage and organize daily tasks. Wajibaty simplifies to-do lists, schedules, and reminders, focusing on accessibility and convenience.

projects.name: SCIC (Supply Chain Intelligence Consultant) Project
projects.description: An AI-powered platform that delivers real-time insights and optimization tools for supply chain management, enabling businesses to reduce costs and improve efficiency.

projects.name: Virtue: Mental Health Application
projects.description: An AI-based mental health platform that helps users improve their mental well-being through personalized tools, secure data management, and a clean user interface.

projects.name: Naseej
projects.description: An AI-driven platform that allows users to discover fashion items by uploading images or links, providing personalized recommendations instantly.
